Package com.redis.riot.file.xml

Class XmlResourceItemWriter<T>

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.batch.item.ItemStreamSupport
org.springframework.batch.item.support.AbstractItemStreamItemWriter<T>
com.redis.riot.resource.AbstractFileItemWriter<T>
com.redis.riot.file.xml.XmlResourceItemWriter<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.batch.item.file.ResourceAwareItemWriterItemStream<T>, org.springframework.batch.item.ItemStream, org.springframework.batch.item.ItemStreamWriter<T>, org.springframework.batch.item.ItemWriter<T>, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
public class XmlResourceItemWriter<T> extends com.redis.riot.resource.AbstractFileItemWriter<T>
Item writer that writes data in XML format to an output file. The location of the output file is defined by a Resource and must represent a writable file. Items are transformed to XML format using a XmlMapper. Items will be enclosed in a XML element as follows: 
 
 <root>
  <record>...</record>
  <record>...</record>
  <record>...</record>
 </root>
The implementation is not thread-safe.
